thread.title: Patriots, Cowboys reportedly interested in DeSean Jackson
thread.title_full: Patriots, Cowboys reportedly interested in DeSean Jackson

author: Mike Florio
title: Patriots, Cowboys reportedly interested in DeSean Jackson
text:
Mar 7, 2017 6:49 PM 
pass (prima donna and not a fit) 
– pats fan Mar 7, 2017 6:51 PM 
smokescreen r502 says: Mar 7, 2017 6:51 PM 
I can see Jackson with the Cowboys fitting in just fine with that freak show culture of Jones and co. He would be a good piece for the Patriots, but money talks loudest if I had to guess what is inside the mind of Jackson. Mar 7, 2017 6:54 PM 
has a better future with the Patriots or Cowboys… wib22 says: Mar 7, 2017 6:55 PM 
I wonder if the patriots offer the revis special, as a one year high money deal where the 2nd year salary is too high and will be voided. Leave a Reply
